Modernas brīvdienu dizaina mājas tavai a: Modern holiday design houses for your relaxation!
Klusuma greznība Siguldas sirdī!: The luxury of silence in the heart of Sigulda!
Īpaša atpūtas vieta tiem, kuri meklē mie: A special retreat for those seeking peace, presence, and a sense of beauty in the very heart of Sigulda. Our story begins in a place where design blends with nature and tranquility becomes the greatest luxury.
Atrodoties tieši līdzās Panorāmas ratam:
Located right next to the Ferris Wheel and Celebration Square, we have created modern holiday design houses that offer not only accommodation but also an experience of feeling. Here, the
landscape becomes part of the interior, and each season brings a new perspective – from misty autumn mornings to snowy peaks or sunny summer days.
Mēs piedāvājam vietu, kur vienkāršība no: We offer a place where simplicity means quality, minimalism reflects mindful comfort, and every detail carries a love for the place we call home. This project is our invitation to return to what truly matters – peace, presence, and beauty.
Izsmalcināta atpūta starp pilsētu un dab: Sophisticated relaxation between city and nature!
Miers nav kaut kur tālu! Tas ir šeit - s: Peace is not somewhere far away! It is here - between design, nature and You!
Drona skats uz māju parku: Drone view of the house park
Ko sniedz pieredze Siguldas Skatos?: What does the experience at Siguldas Skati offer?
Dizaina brīvdienu mājas ar skatu uz Sigu: Design holiday houses with a view of Sigulda!
Mūsu brīvdienu dizaina mājās nav steigas: In our holiday design homes there is no rush – this is a place where you can breathe deeper, hear yourself, and relax without stress.
Pārdomāts dizains, kvalitatīvas detaļas: Thoughtful design, quality details, and coziness that make you feel at home – only better.
Šī nav tikai naktsmītne – tā ir iespēja: This is not just accommodation – it’s an opportunity to pause, feel the environment, and see Sigulda with new eyes.
Vietu pašā Siguldas sirdī, kur daba un p: In the very heart of Sigulda, where nature and the city’s cultural events meet just steps away.
Sigulda ir vairāk nekā galamērķis – tā i: SIGULDA IS MORE THAN JUST A DESTINATION – IT’S A FEELING!
Mēs esam tepat, lai palīdzētu Tev to iep: We are here to help you discover it at your own pace.
Ko vēl darīt Siguldā?: What else to do in Sigulda?
Sigulda ir vieta, kur daba, kultūra un p: Sigulda is a place where nature, culture, and adventures blend into one landscape. No matter the season, everyone can find their own rhythm here – whether it’s a leisurely walk along nature trails, enjoying cultural events, or a small adventure above the treetops.
Uzzini pirmais par jaunumiem!: Be the first to learn about news!

Sazinies ar mums, ja rodas neskaidrības: Contact us if you have any questions or want to learn more about our holiday design houses.
Mūsu brīvdienu mājas atrodas Siguldas ce: Our holiday houses are located in the center of Sigulda, at Cēsu Street 17, next to the Sigulda Panorama Wheel and Festival Square.
Vai pie brīvdienu mājām ir pieejama auto: Is there parking available at the holiday houses?
Jā, viesiem ir pieejama bezmaksas privāt: Yes, free private parking is available for guests at the accommodation.
Jā, naktsmītnes ir piemērota ģimenēm. \": Yes, the accommodation is suitable for families. The "Black" house has a separate children's room and can comfortably accommodate two adults and up to two children.
Kādi ir reģistrēšanās un izrakstīšanās l: What are the check-in and check-out times?
Jā, visās telpās ir pieejams bezmaksas W: Yes, free Wi-Fi is available in all rooms.
Vai brīvdienu mājās ir pieejama virtuve?: Is there a kitchen available in the holiday houses?
Jā, visās brīvdienu mājās ir pilnībā apr: Yes, all holiday houses have a fully equipped kitchen with stovetop, refrigerator, dishwasher, coffee maker and everything needed for meal preparation.
Vai pieejama bērnu gultiņa vai papildus: Is a baby cot or extra bedding available for children?

Ar mājdzīvniekiem pašlaik atpūta mūsu di: Currently pets are not allowed in our design houses.
Vai mājā ir gaisa kondicionētājs un apku: Is there air conditioning and heating in the house?
Jā, māja ir aprīkota ar gaisa kondicionē: Yes, the house is equipped with air conditioning and an efficient heating system to ensure comfort in any season.
Kā notiek rezervācija?: How does the reservation process work?
Rezervāciju iespējams ir veikt tiešsaist: Reservations can be made online through the booking.com reservation platform
Vai sauna un džakūzī ir iekļauts cenā?: Are the sauna and jacuzzi included in the price?
Nē, sauna un džakūzī nav iekļauti naktsm: No, the sauna and jacuzzi are not included in the accommodation price – they are available for an additional fee, with prior reservation.
Mēs priecājamies Jūs uzņemt Siguldas Ska: We are delighted to welcome you to Siguldas Skati and kindly ask you to follow these rules to ensure a pleasant and safe stay for you and other guests!
1.2. Nakšņot drīkst tikai personas, kas: 1.2. Only registered guests listed in the reservation are allowed to stay overnight.
1.3. Teritorijā jāievēro cieņa pret citi: 1.3. Respect other guests and the surrounding environment.
1.4. Lūdzam brīvdienu mājās nepārvietoti: 1.4. Please do not wear outdoor shoes inside the holiday houses.
2.2. Skaļa mūzika un troksnis nav pieļau: 2.2. Loud music or noise is not permitted if it disturbs other guests or neighbors.
2.3. Bērni drošas vides uzturēšanās laik: 2.3. Children must remain under the responsibility of their parents or guardians at all times.
2.4. Viesiem jāievēro cieņa pret citiem: 2.4. Guests must show respect towards other visitors, staff, and neighbors.
2.5. Viesiem jābūt pilngadīgiem, vai arī: 2.5. Guests must be of legal age or accompanied by an adult.
3.1. Lūdzam saudzīgi izturēties pret inv: 3.1. Please handle inventory, furniture, appliances, and premises with care.
3.2. Par bojājumiem vai zaudējumiem vies: 3.2. Guests are financially responsible for any damage or loss caused.
3.3. Aizliegts pārvietot mēbeles vai apr: 3.3. Moving furniture or equipment without prior approval from management is prohibited.
3.4. Ja tiek zaudēta atslēga vai tālvadī: 3.4. If a key or remote control is lost, the guest covers replacement costs (€100).
3.5. Par visiem bojājumiem un zaudējumie: 3.5. Any damages or losses must be reported to the host immediately and not concealed.
3.6. Pārvietošanās pa teritoriju atļauta: 3.6. Movement around the property is only allowed in designated areas, not on the lawn.
3.7. Lūdzam neaiztikt un nepārvietot zāl: 3.7. Please do not touch or move the lawn-mowing i-robot.
4.1. Smēķēšana telpās ir stingri aizlieg: 4.1. Smoking indoors is strictly prohibited (permitted only in designated outdoor areas).
4.2. Par viesu drošību un īpašuma aizsar: 4.2. For guest safety and property protection, video surveillance may operate in the area.
4.3. Saimnieki nav atbildīgi par viesu p: 4.3. The hosts are not responsible for guests' personal belongings.
4.4. Ugunsgrēka gadījumā nekavējoties zv: 4.4. In case of fire or emergency, immediately call 112 and inform the hosts.
5.1. Mājdzīvnieki atļauti tikai pēc iepr: 5.1. Pets are only allowed with prior agreement.
5.2. Mājdzīvnieki nedrīkst traucēt citus: 5.2. Pets must not disturb other guests or damage the property.
6.1. Atkritumi jāizmet tam paredzētajos: 6.1. Waste must be disposed of in designated containers.
6.3. Neatstājiet atkritumus dabā vai uz: 6.3. Do not leave litter in nature or on the property grounds.
6.4. Saglabāsim vidi tīru un sakoptu – l: 6.4. Let's keep our environment clean and tidy – let's take care together.
6.5. Transportlīdzekļi jānovieto tikai t: 6.5. Vehicles must be parked only in designated parking areas.
7.1. Ja tiek pārkāpti noteikumi, adminis: 7.1. In case of rule violations, management reserves the right to evict guests without a refund.
7.2. Viesi atbild par zaudējumiem, kas n: 7.2. Guests are responsible for any damages caused.
7.3. Ugunsdrošības instrukcijas ir jāizp: 7.3. Use of fire and safety rules must be arranged in advance and complied with usage rules.
– Narkotiku, nelikumīgu vielu vai pārmēr: – Use of drugs, illegal substances, or excessive alcohol consumption.
– Ieroču, bīstamu vielu vai sprāgstvielu: – Possession and/or use of weapons, fireworks, or dangerous items on the premises.
Siguldas dabas takas – piedzīvojums jebk: SIGULDA NATURE TRAILS – AN ADVENTURE IN EVERY SEASON
Sigulda ir viena no Latvijas ainaviskāka: Sigulda is one of the most scenic places in Latvia, where nature reveals its beauty in full. The town is surrounded by the trails of Gauja National Park, suitable both for peaceful walks and active recreation. Here you can enjoy breathtaking views from the cliffs of the Gauja valley, cross historic bridges, explore caves and springs, and follow routes that lead through forests, meadows, and along the riverbanks.
Populārākās takas ir Paradīzes taka, Kāj:
The most popular trails include the Paradise Trail, the Footbridge Route, the Krimulda Nature
Trail, and the Devil’s Trail – each offering a unique experience and its own landscapes. In spring
and summer, they are filled with greenery and blossoms; in autumn, a sea of colorful leaves; and
in winter, they transform into a quiet, snowy fairytale.
Siguldas aktīvā atpūta – piedzīvojumi ik: ACTIVE RECREATION IN SIGULDA – ADVENTURES FOR EVERYONE
Sigulda ir Latvijas aktīvās atpūtas galv:
Sigulda is Latvia’s capital of active recreation, where adventures await all year round. In
summer, the city offers the chance to try zipline and alpine coaster rides in the “Tarzāns”
adventure park, cross the Gauja River by aerial cable car, go paddleboarding, or enjoy cycling
routes of various difficulty levels. For a true adrenaline rush, Sigulda’s bobsleigh and luge track
provides thrilling speed both in summer and winter.
Rudenī un pavasarī Sigulda piesaista pār:
In autumn and spring, Sigulda attracts hiking enthusiasts with the colorful trails of Gauja
National Park, while in winter the city transforms into a ski and snowboard hub with several
slopes and equipment rental.
Neatkarīgi no sezonas Siguldā iespējams:
Whatever the season, Sigulda offers the perfect combination of active leisure, nature, and culture
– creating unforgettable experiences for every visitor.
Siguldas kafejnīcas un restorāni – garšu:
SIGULDA’S CAFÉS AND RESTAURANTS – A JOURNEY OF FLAVORS IN THE
HEART OF THE CITY
Sigulda piedāvā daudzveidīgu gastronomis:
Sigulda offers a diverse gastronomic experience – from cozy cafés to refined restaurants. In the
city center, you’ll find bistros with seasonal dishes as well as places specializing in traditional
Latvian cuisine. Food lovers will also enjoy dessert cafés, where local confectioners showcase
their sweet creations.
Vakara noskaņām piemēroti ir restorāni a:
For an evening atmosphere, restaurants with a wide selection of wines and cocktails are a perfect
choice. Meanwhile, for a relaxed afternoon, small cafés serving freshly roasted coffee and
homemade desserts are an ideal fit.
Siguldas gastronomiskā ainava apvieno vi:
Sigulda’s culinary scene blends local character with international trends, offering options for
every taste and mood – whether it’s a quick meal after an active day or an unhurried dinner in a
special atmosphere.
Iesakām apmeklēt: ESI cafe (Pils 4b), Ap:
Recommended places to visit: ESI cafe (Pils 4b), Aparjods (Ventas Street 1A), Lielais Loms
Sushi (Krišjāņa Valdemāra Street 2).
Sigulda, bieži dēvēta par “Vidzemes Švei:
Sigulda, often called the “Switzerland of Vidzeme,” is a town with a rich history and a strong
cultural identity. The first written records of Sigulda date back to the 13th century, when the
Sigulda medieval castle complex was built, later joined by Turaida Castle and Krimulda Manor.
Today, these historic landmarks are important cultural and tourist sites, telling the story of the
region’s development over more than eight centuries.
Sigulda vienmēr bijusi kultūras un māksl:
Sigulda has always been a center of culture and the arts, regularly hosting music festivals, theater
performances, folk tradition events, and art exhibitions. Of particular note are the Sigulda Opera
Music Festival and the summer concerts held in the castle ruins, which combine a unique setting
with a high-quality musical program.
Mūsdienās pilsēta harmoniski apvieno sen:
Today, the town harmoniously blends its historical heritage with a vibrant cultural life, offering
both locals and visitors diverse opportunities to explore history, enjoy art, and take part in
creative events. From medieval castle ruins to contemporary art installations – Sigulda is a place
where history and culture coexist and enrich one another.
